attributes.action: Ignore what vegetarians and vegans think about £5 notes
attributes.background: Vegetarians and vegans are allegedly "furious" about the new £5 containing tallow. These leather wearing, plastic using consumers of pharmaceutical and gelatinous  products are boring the rest of us with their hypocrisy and faux air of superiority/ outrage when they should just bore off

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to urge the Bank of England not to change the content of £5 notes.
